content: Malaysian actor and comedian (1959–2015) **Haron Aminar Rashid bin Salim**, popularly known as **Harun Salim Bachik**, (19 May 1959 – 8 March 2015) was a [Malaysian](/wiki/Malaysian_people) actor and comedian. He was the father of [Danial Al Rashid Haron Aminar Rashid](/wiki/Danial_Al_Rashid_Haron_Aminar_Rashid), a politician and Member of the [Selangor State Legislative Assembly](/wiki/Selangor_State_Legislative_Assembly) (MLA) for [Batu Tiga](/wiki/Batu_Tiga_(state_constituency)). ## Career Born in Singapore, Harun was the son of a veteran actor of the 50s era, Salim Bachik. Harun became known through his acting in the drama series titled *Rumah Kedai*, which aired on [TV3](/wiki/TV3_(Malaysian_TV_network)) from 1988 to 1993. In 2001, he stunned Malaysia's acting industry after winning Best Male TV Actor at the seventh Anugerah Skrin for his serious role in the drama *Hangatnya Salju Dinginnya Bara*. Harun was also involved in the sitcom series *Gado-Gado*, which aired on [TV1](/wiki/TV1_(Malaysian_TV_network)). It became a real stepping stone for him in the world of acting. Apart from acting, Harun was also a singer. He once produced an album in 1996 entitled *Belilah*. The most popular song on the album is *Banjir*. Through the film *Baik Punya Cilok* (2005), he was nominated as the Best Supporting Actor at the [Malaysia Film Festival](/wiki/Malaysia_Film_Festival). Through the film *[KIL](/wiki/KIL_(film))* (2013), he was nominated for a similar award at the Screen Awards 2013. ## Politics He and [Afdlin Shauki](/wiki/Afdlin_Shauki) joined [UMNO](/wiki/UMNO) in 2012. ## Filmography ### Film YearTitleRoleNotes2003*Mr. Cinderella 2*KudinDebut film2005*Baik Punya Cilok*Leman2006*Man Laksa*Saedon Dengki2007*Cinta Yang Satu*Hashim2008*[Cuci](/wiki/Cuci_(film))*Janitor*Apa Kata Hati?*Hamidi*Antoofighter: Amukan Drakulat!*Pak Din2009*Setem*Marcello*Duhai Si Pari-Pari*Para*[Papadom](/wiki/Papadom_(film))*Hussin*My Spy*Salleh2010*Lu Pikirlah Sendiri de Movie*Tauke pasar borong*Kapoww!*Astromen Belalang2011*Tolong Awek Aku Pontianak*Pak Harun*Aku Bukan Tomboy*Rahim2012*Cinta Kura Kura*Nazri*Hoore!
